castPredicate< Base, Sub > Class Template Reference

Unary predicate for controlling if an object of type Base may be dynamic_cast to type Sub. Only works for polymorphic classes i.e. classes with at least one virtual function. More...

Detailed Description

template<class Base, class Sub>
class castPredicate< Base, Sub >

Unary predicate for controlling if an object of type Base may be dynamic_cast to type Sub. Only works for polymorphic classes i.e. classes with at least one virtual function.
